creditline: The John R. Van Derlip Fund
description: covered sugar bowl (part of coffee service), oval urn-shaped on high foot with shaped outline; around an applied silver band chased with alternating octagon and twisted rope pattern; on each side a set-in round medallion of silver with border of chased saw-tooth and leaf pattern; medallion on front carries monogram <F.M.> in octagonal panel; reeding on finial and base
title: Covered sugar bowl from a tea service
